nodes.text: Star Wars: Complete Vehicles is a 2016 hardcover reference title from DK Publishing that was available exclusively in the United Kingdom. This book is a reissue of the original 2013 edition of Star Wars: Complete Vehicles but with updated content from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens.

However, as this edition notes, the original 2013 text found in this book is considered part of the non-canon Star Wars Legends continuity. The new The Force Awakens content in this book, which remains part of the official Star Wars canon, was originally published in Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Incredible Cross-Sections (2015).

Two versions of this "updated" edition have been released. The 2016 edition features cover artwork of Poe Dameron's T-70 X-wing starfighter, Black One. A 2017 edition features cover artwork of Rey's speeder. Both updated editions feature identical interior content.
